name: Fireworks Hero!
description:
▶ FIREWORKS ◆ ARE ◆ AWESOME! ◀

Ten heroes. One hundred types of fireworks. Millions of sparkles..and TRILLIONS of points!

Featuring a wide range of game modes, ranging from action-packed Arcade to creative modes to two-player versus modes! Design your own fireworks, or challenge a friend to Spark Pong! Take on the Challenge stages, or fire your own fireworks in Launcher mode!

Travel around the world, from New York City to Johannesburg, from Seoul to Rio de Janeiro, from Mumbai to Cairo, see the Eiffel Tower and the Jerusalem's Dome of the Rock...launch beautiful fireworks over stunning skylines -- and see if you can be the next Fireworks Hero!

Customize your weather conditions -- is it so clear you can see the Milky Way? Is the moon out? Are there romantic cumulus clouds? Set up the perfect sky for a beautiful fireworks show!

Fireworks Hero is a fully multi-touch game, so play with a friend and see how far you can get! Good luck, and who knows...maybe you'll even unlock the EMOJI fireworks!
